---
title: "Reading Files"
output: html_document
---
Setup:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(vroom)
```

Testing:

```{r}
data_path <- '../Wharton #2 (Fundation)/data/'

days_d <- paste0(data_path, 'daily_vitals.csv') %>% read_csv()
visit_hospital_d <- paste0(data_path, 'visit_hospital.csv') %>% read_csv()
skim(visit_hospital_d)
unique(visit_hospital_d$hospital)



k_d <- paste0(data_path, 'potassium_data.csv') %>% 
  vroom()
skim(k_d)
# k_d[is.na(k_d)] <- 0

k_d <- k_d %>%
  merge(visit_hospital_d, by = 'visit_num')
k_d[2873:2875, 'gfr_aa']
summary(k_d$gfr_aa)
summary(k_d$gfr_nonaa)

skimr::skim(k_d)
colnames(k_d)
```
